alert.note: Alert for Gregg; Harrison; Panola; Shelby (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 25 at 12:46AM CDT by NWS Shreveport
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern Harrison, western Panola, central Rusk, northwestern Nacogdoches, northwestern Shelby and southeastern Gregg Counties through 115 AM CDT... At 1246 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Kilgore to 8 miles northeast of Henderson to near Pinehill to 8 miles southeast of Minden to 6 miles northeast of Trawick to near Douglass. Movement was northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Nacogdoches, Henderson, Kilgore, Carthage, Tatum, Timpson, Garrison, Beckville, Pinehill, Minden, Lakeport, Easton, Appleby, Mount Enterprise, Gary City, Fairplay, Stewart, Chalk Hill, Dotson and Oak Hill. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
